name: Ext_R5_StructureDefinition_fhirVersion
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.StructureDefinition.fhirVersion for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents StructureDefinition.fhirVersion from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The version of the FHIR specification on which this StructureDefinition is based - this is the formal version of the specification, without the revision number, e.g. [publication].[major].[minor], which is 4.6.0. for this version.
element.comment: `StructureDefinition.fhirVersion` maps to R4 `StructureDefinition.fhirVersion`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `StructureDefinition.fhirVersion` maps to R4 `StructureDefinition.fhirVersion`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
